page.title: 01Linton Northumberland
page.content: This area has the 2000 acre site of Butterwell opencast to the west and the large Ellington-Lynemouth colliery to the east. The landscape is in the process of change. the Buterwell screening and loading plant is within the area. The roads are infested with heavyy waggons and much farmland has been lost. Linton colliery has closed and is being demolished. Sheep and cattle are reared and some corn grown. The scars of mining remain and villages like Linton, Widdrington Station and Ellington provided workers for many local collieries. Now Stobswood Brickworks and Alcan employ many men.
